title: Schedule change for URF this weekend
body:
Hey everyone,

As you know the availability modes for rotating game modes are 11AM AEST to 3AM AEST on weekends.

Because this weekend is URF and we know that it’s more popular than the others we will be making the availability window for the full duration this weekend.

This means URF will come online around 11AM AEST on Friday 22 April through to 3AM AEST on Monday April 25.

The normal schedule for rotating game modes will resume the week after.

replies.body:
>24/7 this weekend.

That good sir, is not how 24/7 works, that is like 24/3
You are correct good sir, thank you for pointing out said error. It has been remedied!
How do you think you could go about getting it to extend to Monday as Monday's a Public Holiday? :)
YES I TOTALLY AGREE WITH THIS. IF only it actually happened...
still not here...
AEST is eastern time for Australian
When does URF go live in North America?!
Its on EUW 8)
lucky bastard, here its 2 pm and still not avalaible
11AM AEST is 6PM Pacific Standard Time, 7PM Mountain Standard Time, 8PM Central Standard Time, 9PM Eastern Standard Time. {{champion:32}}
It is the 22 april but there si no URF {{item:3070}}
it's not very clear for me WHEN THE FACK MY URF IS!!!

Ummmm is there anywhere where the alternative game style rules can be found? 

As lame as it is, i was a little surprised to find ascension was a "alternate game mode" on oce? When my old account was on NA, this was always available. Not super popular, but always available but had changed from when i knew it so it took a few games to realize then just stopped... Poro king?!?!?!.... just aram, not hard to know... But URF mode... 

There is no links into "This game mode is here, click here for a short guide on the rules and gameplay to the scenario" can be pretty crappy way to start up, my first ascension was me getting flamed sideways for 10mins, after a few i just followed people around openly admitting... i got nfi whats going on really, the style changed.

Hey there! 

We post the rules in the same post that announces a game mode went live and the upcoming schedule. We're trying to keep it consistant location so you can check back every friday:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/

Here is the Ascension link:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/rotating-game-mode-queue-now-live

Here is the KingPoro link:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/rotating-game-mode-queue-now-live-0

Cheers!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Where the fuck is urf! where bitch!
Does the 11:00 AM AEST stand for 11:00 AM Australian Eastern Standard Time or  11:00 AM American Eastern Standard Time?
This is the Oceanic server so all times are in Australian Eastern Standard Time.
URF hasn't yet been enabled on NA server, is this just for a specific server or is the enabling just behind?
All of the servers operate off of local time. Australia is a day ahead, so they get all of the game modes ahead of us.

Dear Riot, 

Today I logged into League and found there was no more URF queue! It made me super sad, because today I don't have to go to work, and I was really looking forward to relaxing with games and friends.

I'm really confused why League would do this to me. I mean, first he extends the queue times because he knows how much I love URF, then he TOTALLY forgets that its a long weekend and I can play all through Monday. I mean, talk about mixed messages!

Sometimes, it really feels like League cares about me - he let's me know when sales are coming up, he always invites me to the coolest eSpots matches, there was even this one time when he built an artificial reef with my name on it! Swoon!

But then he pulls stuff like this and it feels neglectful, you know? Like maybe he has more important things than me going on? 

Please help! Am I being too sensitive? Or should he be putting me first?

Thanks for your advice,
Hurt & Confused
This should to be made available today also since it is a public holiday for us here.
ANZAC Weekend is this weekend, meaning a public holiday on the Monday. Any chance URF can be extended until 3am Tuesday?
Why is there an hourly restriction in the first place? If you are only leaving them up for 3 days, why tell people who work from 11 to 10 on the weekends they might get 5 hours to play them?

Hey, I am assuming you play on NA as your account is tagged there.

We have less players in Oceania than in North America. That means that we haven't yet grown to the point of being able to have all queues on all the time. We have set enable times to make sure that there is a healthy matchmaking experience during that window of availability.

These are all specific to the Oceania server, not North America. Just like the times listed in the main post are for the Oceanic server.
its 2 pm here and still no URF{{item:3070}}
11AM AEST is 6PM Pacific Standard Time, 7PM Mountain Standard Time, 8PM Central Standard Time, 9PM Eastern Standard Time. {{champion:32}}

Its already saturday in the AEST time zone. 

11AM AEST  on FRIDAY the 22nd of April .... has ALREADY passed.    They are 15 hours late. lol

That means it should've released yesterday at 8pm. OAO 

UNLESS they are purposefully lagging us. But if that was the case they should've said.

Please, stop basing NA's shit on our server :|. You get things are different times on YOUR server. It doesn't go live for you when it goes live for Australia. You have your own NA time-zone things go live on. In the same way we patch a day earlier than NA, you don't patch when we patch. You don't get a game mode the second we do.
EDIT:  IT JUST popped up right now. 15 hours late. lol
why not add URF Co-op vs AI? It will be interesting to see AI controlled Lux and Vega in URF mode!{{item:3108}}
No. Because that would be Doom Bots.

あなたをファック！。糞の多くはに集まっ
地球上のスツールであるとして、あなたは白として。

ゲームをヘッドに送られている、削除されません、あなたの母親が強制ヒット

엿 먹어! . 대변의 많은에 모여
지구에 대변 한, 흰색 당신은.

이 게임은 그가 머리로 전송, 삭제되지 않으며, 당신의 어머니가 강제 공격

Heard from friends that URF is back and looked forward to enjoy the URF crazy mode, and realised its only for the weekend.... once again another disappointment...
They should at least put it up for a week so people who have to work on the weekend can play it too... just saying...
Why U.R.F is only one times and Acesion is 2 times in row , urf will be to 2nd time ?.

Yes, URF will be appearing again. The only reason it's going back to Ascension next week is that it is starting the rotation again. After Ascension we *should* see Legend of the Poro King followed by URF followed by One For All, then it will either start back at Ascension again or more modes will be added (it's possible Riot may add modes in the middle of the rotation rather than at the end, though).
Only weekends? I work on weekends. The game modes available on OCE is getting very boring.............
bro make urf permanent  all the other games modes are shit

Looks like I'll be missing out

If your on a North American server, URF will be released at 6:00 P.M. Pacific Time, 7:00 P.M. Mountain Time, and 8:00 P.M. Eastern Time
